医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
GLP-1药物大艾丝苷对帕金森的新研究没有任何好处GLP-1药物（艾烯二）对帕金森氏症患者的运动，症状或大脑成像没有积极影响，发现由UCL研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/glp-1-drug-exenatide-shows-nows-now-no-benefit-for-parkinsons-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/glp-1-drug-exenatide-shows-nows-now-no-benefor-for-parkinsons-in-new-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad7E3D53-97DB-483E-483E-A4CB-419892E6E3C6 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 21:39:30 -0500 GLP-1 drug exenatide shows no benefit for Parkinson's in new study
高HDL胆固醇可能会增加老年人青光眼风险通常被认为对健康有益的“好”（HDL）胆固醇可能与严重的眼部疾病的风险升高有关，青光眼至少在55s中 - 表明了一项大型观察性研究的结果英国眼科杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/high-high-hdl-cholesterol-may-incrase-glaucoma-glaucoma-flaucoma------------in grod-inder-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/high-high-hdl-cholesterol-may-incrase-glaucoma-glaucoma-risk-in---in----in grod-odults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B2D8B113-010B-4290-9B33-76C914177A7B Tue, 04 Feb 2025 21:34:56 -0500 High HDL cholesterol may increase glaucoma risk in older adults
更年期晚期与女性更好的血管健康有关根据科罗拉多州新大学博尔德大学（New University of Colorado Boulder Research）的说法，在以后的生活中经历更年期的妇女已经有多年的血管健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/late-menopause-linked-to-better-better-anter-nealth-health-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/late-menopause-linked-to-better-better-taster-cascular-health-health-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5D45F101-F815-4796-B4D6-51AACD833485 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 21:30:52 -0500 Late menopause linked to better vascular health in women

科学家设计策略，以防止蒽环类药物的心脏毒性作用与国际合作伙伴合作的Centro Nacional de Resjuctiones心血管群（CNIC）的科学家团队设计了一种策略，以防止Anthracyclines的心脏毒性作用，Anthrocyclines是一种广泛使用的抗癌药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/scientists-design-singe--strategy-for-for-for-cardiotiotic-cardiotodeffect-formeffects-ontharcyclines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/scientists-design-sign-strategy-for-for-preventing-cardiotovecic-formeffects-ofnallacyclines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e99f7fa3-c1a4-444c-8b76-1781a27e9c79 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 21:19:34 -0500 Scientists design strategy for preventing cardiotoxic effects of anthracyclines
实验药物表明在恢复阿尔茨海默氏症模型中的记忆方面有望成瘾与心理健康中心（CAMH）的一项范式转移研究表明，一种实验性药物GL-II-73具有在阿尔茨海默氏病小鼠模型中恢复记忆和认知功能的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/experiment-drug-shows-promise-in-restoring-memory-in-alzheimers-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/experiment-drug-shows-promise-in-restoring-memory-in-alzheimers-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=201D8BC6-F5EA-453B-B4D2-FE18DAF82F07 Tue, 04 Feb 2025 21:13:58 -0500 Experimental drug shows promise in restoring memory in Alzheimer's model
科学家将预防脑炎症视为阿尔茨海默氏症治疗的关键来自Dzne，大学医院波恩（UKB）和波恩大学的科学家提供了新的证据，表明预防脑部炎症是治疗阿尔茨海默氏病的一种有前途的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/scientists-nistify-brain-inflammatife-prevention-prevention-as-key-to-to-alzheimers-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/scientist-sideist-sideify-brain-inflammation-prevention-prevention-as-key-to-alzheimers-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76B43380-4F99-4C55-B040-92B89FDDDBCC Tue, 04 Feb 2025 21:09:45 -0500 Scientists identify brain inflammation prevention as key to Alzheimer's treatment
新方法使用DNA测序进行精确的代谢物测量多伦多大学的研究人员发明了一种使用DNA测序来测量代谢产物的新方法。这可以快速，精确地分析生物化合物，例如糖，维生素，激素和数百种对健康至关重要的代谢产物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/new-method-uses-dna-sequesing-for-precise-metabolite-measurite.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250204/new-method-uses-dna-sequesing-for-presise-metabolite-measurite.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbd4a516-e9ab-4C80-B853-D0AB6A15F7AC Tue, 04 Feb 2025 21:03:00 -0500 New method uses DNA sequencing for precise metabolite measurement
